channel.title: Comments on: Links for Fri 7 Mar 2008

item.title: By: Nikolay
item.dc:creator: Nikolay
item.description: I am using (and loving) the <a href="http://lifehacker.com/software/gmail/lifehacker-code-better-gmail-firefox-extension-251923.php" rel="nofollow">Better Gmail extension</a>. It has some neat additional shortcuts shortcuts, which you can see by pressing <code>h</code>.
item.content:encoded: I am using (and loving) the Better Gmail extension. It has some neat additional shortcuts shortcuts, which you can see by pressing h.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: Haha, hadn't thought about it as a feature.
item.content:encoded: Haha, hadn’t thought about it as a feature.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd

item.description:
You can delete mail in gmail? ;-)
To prevent accidental deletes?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Lloyd -
The one that gets me is the # for delete. Not sure why they didn't just use d for delete.
item.content:encoded:
@Lloyd –

The one that gets me is the # for delete. Not sure why they didn’t just use d for delete.
